entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 09
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 4 Photos of the special event 1992-0728 Public Program, Budapest, Hungary have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 6 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Hungary 1992.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
